lead_paragraph: Chai Eun Hillmann, an aspiring actor, was fatally stabbed outside a Brooklyn bar when he tried to untangle his dog from another.
snippet: Chai Eun Hillmann, an aspiring actor, was fatally stabbed outside a Brooklyn bar when he tried to untangle his dog from another.

headline.main: Owner Killed After Dog Leashes Are Tangled
headline.seo: Dog Owner Fatally Stabbed Ouside Brooklyn Bar
headline.print_headline: Owner Killed After Dog Leashes Are Tangled
